subject: Request for Purchase and Invoice Information
description_text:
My name is Leandro Mansur, and my registered email is
leandro.mansur@gmail.com.

 

I am interested in purchasing the following items:

*	Pro X Ultra-P3-H3
*	Baseplate
*	VAM Rumble Motor (3 pack / includes power supply)

 

The total value of the products is $457.80. I would like to ask:

 

1.	Is it possible to receive a discount on this purchase?
2.	Could you issue the invoice with a lower declared value in order to
help reduce high customs duties?
3.	If possible, could the items be declared as products for
demonstration or testing?
4.	 

The products I want are already in my shopping cart.

 

Thank you very much for your support, and I look forward to your response.

 

Best regards,


Leandro Mansur

 

Whatsapp +5521966334004

conversations.body_text: Hi Leandro. mansur,    Sorry for not replying to you in time, we just finished our vacation. You can use this 10% discount code: Cart10  Yes, we can issue an invoice that meets your requirements, please don't worry, you can leave a note in the order or send us a email after placing the order.

?? Português (formal e claro)

A alfândega poderá solicitar a comprovação do valor efetivamente pago pelo produto.

Conforme mencionado anteriormente, se possível, peço a gentileza de declarar o produto como destinado a testes, amostras ou algo semelhante, a fim de simplificar o processo e evitar cobranças adicionais.

  _____  

?? English (formal and clear)

The customs authorities may request proof of the actual amount paid for the product.

As mentioned earlier, if possible, I kindly ask that the product be declared as intended for testing, samples, or something similar, in order to simplify the process and potentially reduce additional charges.

 

 

De: support@simsonn.com
Hi Leandro. mansur,    Okay, we will file the application based on the information you have provided.

Hi Leandro. mansur, the shipping cost to Brazil is extremely high, 955.87 RMB, which is approximately 133 USD. We need you to cover the fuel surcharge of 224.11 RMB, which is approximately 31.2 USD. Is that acceptable?
Regarding the document, I believe it will help me. Now as for shipping, I already paid $39.90. Why do I have to pay again?

Hi Leandro. mansur,    Since we cannot afford such high shipping costs, our shipping fees are not calculated based on smart matching by logistics companies. Therefore, for particularly high shipping costs, we usually sacrifice most of our profits and ask customers to bear part of the cost, as we cannot allow orders to be loss-making. Thank you for your understanding.     Also, this is your tax return invoice. We cannot declare it as zero. Is this okay with you?

Thank you, I believe this is sufficient for customs purposes. Can you tell
me when it will be posted?

*Leandro Mansur*
*(21)96633-4004*
